channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Waste dumped all over Craig’s Court, 9th September
item.description:
Bin bags construction waste buckets from pubs, feces, urine, crushed glass... dumped all over Craig’s Court especially behind Silver Cross, in the alleyway and next to Walker's of Whitehall / bt exchange - how is this acceptable and why does it continue to be tolerated?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Craig's Court, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lamp 271/08 not working, 9th September
item.description:
Street lamp no. 271/08 (diagonally opposite no. 111 Rotherhithe St SE16 4NF) is not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 113, Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light keeps flashing on and off, 9th September
item.description:
Street light just to the right of the Village fish and chip shop has been going on and off and flashing at night for a couple of weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89, Beckenham Lane, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pavement is sinking, 9th September
item.description:
It's super uneven, some slabs are loose, it's sinking more and more every month. Today I nearly tripped over one of the slabs. It looks like it was marked months ago for remedial work, but instead it has sunk even more.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broadway, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damping ground, 9th September
item.description:
This is been days after days that people use this area as dumping ground. Can you please find a way to fix this from happening. Maybe a wall ..so there is no gap for rubbish and daggy people to stand there

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead Common Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped over a month ago, 9th September

item.title: Dumped rubbish on the corner of Mackenzie Road and Beckenham Road, 9th September
item.description:
Please see today’s dumping after the early street cleaning on the site This problem is continuing and the residents of the property have obvious not been provided with suitable refuse storage as defined in the planning condition when these properties were converted for residential use

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mackenzie Road, Penge, London

item.title: Thames Path blocked, 9th September
item.description:
Thames path has been blocked by locked gates between Imperial Court and New Caledonian Wharf and so preventing access. In addition Odessa Street is not navigable on footpaths for a wheelchair and so it is unsafe for wheelchair users to travel along this part of the Thames Path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Odessa Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet
